website_summaries.verdict: Versatile. A solid choice for consumers who prefer a variety of styles and color choices.
pros: Features soft latex cushioning and flexible construction
Numerous stitch designs are available in black and varying shades of brown
cons: We found that the shoe runs long for the size, and some testers felt that the toe is somewhat pointy

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE CHEAP PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe and great price. Only issue is they struggle to breath so make sure to get something to handle the smell in there. EDIT: AFTER 6 MONTHS I'M DOWNGRADING TO 1 STAR. AFTER WEARING EVERY 3RD DAY, THESE HAVE ALREADY FALLEN APART TO BEING UNWEARABLE AND NEEDING REPLACEMENT. Think of it this way. $30 shoe lasts 75 wears=$0.40 per wear and cannot be resoled so needs replacement. $100 shoes last 300 wears=$0.33 per wear but not worth resoling as it would cost the same as a new shoe. $300 shoes last 2000 wears but cost $100 to resole every 1000 wears=$0.25 per wear and simply look better and more refined and are more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: aph

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. You get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.text: Well, its a comfortable shoe. And that is the reason for the four stars. But I must say that it is a cheap looking shoe when worn. Don't wear these with a really fine suit. These are not designed for that. These are strictly for casual looking clothing. Even when I put on my heal savers, I noticed that the soles are all rubber when hammering the small nails in to connect the heal savers. While wearing them, it reminds me of an orthopedic shoe. Something nurses would wear or people who work in an environment where they are standing all day long. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: G. Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: very good!
customer_reviews.text: my son looked so good in these shoes, they are perfect for black tie events and can be worn over and over without scruffs and such. it fit him perfectly not to big nor small perfect fit. excuse the seriousness of my son lol. he had enough pictures for that night but as you can see the shoes look great!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Got these as needed dress shoes fast DON't waste your money Don't fit right Had to relace them ????? Yes laces where backwards need them to wear tomorow then I WILL TOSS IN TRASH. Hope this review saves some body money.
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: For the cost these are hard to beat.
customer_reviews.text: If you need an inexpensive, comfortable last minute dress shoe you cannot go wrong with these. If I had any suggestions its to stretch em out of the box or break em in on an afternoon around the house for maximum comfort on the day of the event. They wrinkle when they bend so a learned eye will know they're cheap but unless you care about that sort of thing buy these, go have fun or look good and knock it out of the park. And they're not retail job comfortable but they're comfy enough for an all day wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey A. Sergeant

customer_reviews.title: High quality real leather shoes! I love them!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are magnificent! They fit perfect, extremely comfy, real leather and the color is just right. After spending my weekend in various department stores I couldn't find anything I like for a reasonable price. I needed shoes for work so didn't want to pay an arm and a leg. Well, I went on Amazon and ordered these not expecting much but boy are these shoes fancy and nice! Buy with confidence, as my review is honest and true and I am not a paid promoter but a real customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amur

customer_reviews.title: It looked good and was comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is worth the $35 that I paid for. It looked good and was comfortable. After about 2 months,the sole of the shoe started to come apart. I was able to glue it back together to make it back home to try to fix it more. I am hard on my feet and walk about 5 miles a day in the shoes on multiple terrain. Might work a little better if in an office setting or more dress look.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte McPeak

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent shoe. looks nice and gets the job done at the office. Arch support was dismal, had to get arch support inserts after 3 months. I've currently had the shoes for about 5 months now and the seams at the toe box are starting to come undone. I was hoping this shoe would last at least a year seeing as how i literally only wear it to the office and back home, but nope! Not even 6 months in and its falling apart. Lesson learned, buy cheap crap, get cheap crap. You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great dress shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bruno Marc shoe are reasonably price, and you get a lot for your money. Of course they are nothing like a $500 pair of Gucci dress shoe, but for the price, Bruno Marc shoes are a great deal. They look classy, and I've received some many compliments. They fit true to my 10 1/2 size. Give them a try! I think you will like them.
customer_reviews.author: greeneyes007

customer_reviews.title: Good For Infrequent Wear
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to wear with a couple of nice suits that I have, more along the lines of for special occasions. They look very sharp out of the box and fit as expected. The inner soles aren't very soft and feel very thin. The upper leather creased very quickly upon walking around in them, and I would expect it to crack and break down relatively quickly. I would not recommend these to someone who needs a pair of shoes to wear all day, every day. But in wearing them not very often for a special occasion, they look good and fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus R. Edmunds

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a daily work shoe, and it lives up to the quality I expect. This shoe fit perfectly when it arrived, little arch support (but what dress shoe really has a good one), and held up well for the first month of true work wearing (office space). I also like it is advertised as Made in USA - the detailing was excellent with no flaws in workmanship! Will purchase others when this pair is done or I need another color.
customer_reviews.author: Terry C

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fall apart at the seams (quickly)
customer_reviews.text: Put simply, the shoes are not sturdy. I have bought two pairs of this shoe. On both occasions, the heel burst from its seam after only a few uses. As a point of reference, I typically wear a pair of dress shoes on average twice a week at most. The more recent shoes were toast after about 4 weeks of light use. I thought the first instance of this was just bad luck, but now that the shoe has had the same problem twice, I felt the need to mention the trend. Yes, the price of the shoe is nice, but you are better suited to buy a more expensive pair of shoes from a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Tubbs

customer_reviews.title: true to size
customer_reviews.text: shoes fit as i expected I do not wear them everyday or even on a regular basis the next time i will wear these will be in April of next year spent the entire evening at a wedding last night no complaints fit was good could use some insoles if youre gonna be wearing them on the regular but I have to say I got lucky as I didn't even try them on til the day of cause I'm a dummy but they worked for me fit true to size
customer_reviews.author: Dana Muller

customer_reviews.title: Both say they are completely comfortable. They both wore them on their graduation days ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased two pairs of Bruno Marc shoes for two of my sons. Both say they are completely comfortable. They both wore them on their graduation days and now my oldest wears his every day for work and he’s on his feet all day. When he gets home he doesn’t even take them off. He will continue to wear them around the house till he’s ready to settle down for the evening. It’s as if he doesn’t even notice he’s wearing shoes... go figure...
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I always buy a size 10 on formal shoes... this ones are way to large.
customer_reviews.text: I have several formal/oxford shoes and i always buy them half size bigger because my feet are too wide so i expect about 1cm to be free on the toe box because of this. With these shoes i got the right width for my feet on size 10 but the toe box is extremely large. Like 2 cms longer than my toes. i dont want to look like a clown so ill just leave gift them to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Abad R

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I anticipated this pair of dress shoes to take some of a beating due to the conditions they’ll be worn in, so I didn’t want to spend a lot. I was cautious but figured it was worth a shot, and I’m glad I did. The shoes look nice and for being “cheap”, they are fairly comfortable and most importantly, they don’t hurt my feet. Are they the best, of course not, but they are better than I expected for roughly $30 shoes. I’ve spent more and gotten worse on other pairs, so I’m content with them. Now I’m curious to see their longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Marc B

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price range
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of Bruno Marc shoes. I burn through dress shoes at work due to being requires to look professional while still taking on some rough aspects of the job. These are by far the best pair I have bought. Much more comfortable then most of their shoes. Each pair tends to last me 3-4 months of constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Drew S.

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pair for a wedding. I don't expect to wear them a lot, so I don't need anything that is super good quality. When they arrived, they looked pretty good, can't tell it is not real leather. I tried them on and they seem to fit very well, but I have not worn them for real yet, not sure if they are comfortable if I were to wear them for a whole day. Considering the price, I think it is a good deal, for occasional wear.
customer_reviews.author: wcy

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes that kill your feet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the shoes on a lightning deal. Unfortunately they’ve done nothing but waste my money and hurt my feet. Full disclosure I am typically in dress shoes about 10 hours a day. On my first date in on the shoes and finally decided to order another pair at a local store for in-store pick up, Just to get these off my feet. Unless you plan on wearing these for a very short period of time stay away and don’t make the mistake that I made.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Henry

customer_reviews.title: Was completely out of use after 2.5 month of everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: I used it everyday for about 2.5 month. They look shiny and beautiful and fit really well. However the small scratch appeared on the board left and right small Feet fingers sides and after 2.5 month the sole fell off in front. I can change the review if the product will be exchanged.
customer_reviews.author: Evgeny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two pairs; A size 14 for my friend and a size 15 for myself. They came in and I tried them on; which I wish they were a bit wider, the shoe size was just as expected. For this price, I expected a cheap, sad pair of shoes that would only be used rarely because they would die if worn too much. The shoes fit perfectly, are high quality, and look very dapper. Very good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: What was I thinking?
customer_reviews.text: First off a squared-toe dress shoe is way, way passe. Real style is round toe. My bad. Second, Not a good fit, tight and a bit cramped whereas Rockports and Dockers in the same size fit great. I'll keep these for something super-super casual, like jeans. If I don't have to wear them too long.
customer_reviews.author: TheEditor

customer_reviews.title: Zero Comfort and wide fit-they classify as shoes-
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Cruise Ship Formal night. Fit was loose and Uncomfortable- Clod Hopping to the dinner and Zero Padding inside. Not Recommended . Wish i would have worn them sooner so i could have returned them..ugh. Now stuck with $30 shoes i will never wear again... dang it...
customer_reviews.author: Paullco

customer_reviews.title: Good for interviews (entry-mid level)
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a pair of interview shoes that he would not be devastated if they suffered scuffing or doubled as a daily wear for wait staff. The latter might be a stretch, not a lot of arch support but a good value at their price.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Sattler

customer_reviews.title: I like!
customer_reviews.text: It’s an inexpensive shoe for a great price if you only looking to wear it occasionally it is man-made materials, but durable enough to wear Two or three times a week, and if so, place taps on the heels and toes to save some wear on the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Aouric

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good!
customer_reviews.text: I received my order on yesterday. I'm really impressed with these shoes. I bought them just to work in. I'm expecting them to last 6 months to a year which is fine with me because of the price. I can order another pair. I had the building shoe shine guy to shine them up for me. They look even better. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: D. Woods Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyday wear
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for price, but if you wear dress shoes daily for work invest in a better quality shoes, the soles came apart from the toes in just 3 months of wear, but if you are only needing them for the occasional wedding/funeral these are perfect and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Zach F.

customer_reviews.title: Squeak noises when you walk. Very noticeable.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is ok, look nice at first but there is already some peeling of the "leather" material around the edges right out of the box. The worst part is the soles have air in them and squeak every time you step. Not wearable in a quiet office.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood Cole

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a fine dining restaurant where black dress shoes are required. Obviously I’m not going to wear $150 shoes to work, and these are perfect for just that. Great quality for the price, semi-slip resistant, I don’t mind that I wear them out in 6 months. I’ll be ordering another pair when I run through these.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Rhine

customer_reviews.title: Even size 14 is to small
customer_reviews.text: I am fan of Bruno Marc shoes since years and years, buying shoes for my husband Bruno Marc only and always size 14 was perfect for him, but this model size 14 is to small. Quality is as allays perfect, only sizing is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki S.

customer_reviews.title: Very quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Given the price, I was very impressed with the quality of these shoes. Note that these are the newer style with narrower, longer toes than the more classical rounded toe "oxfords." All in all, a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. McKee

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage. First time buying shoes online before trying them ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. First time buying shoes online before trying them on. They surprising fit and aren't too uncomfortable for non gym shoes but the actual shoes are horrible. They're heels let out a little air each step which makes an awful now. Quality of soles and the shoes are already falling apart after less than a month of moderate use. Save your money and look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous 2727

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several shoes from Bruno Marc's and like this tan version as well. The quality of the stitching and fit seems good. Insole support is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Peiris M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Sole came apart after a month of wearing to school 2 days a week.
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping and just what I ordered. Sole came apart after a month of wearing only 2 days a week to school. Only walking was done in the shoes. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Bunn

customer_reviews.title: Look sleek but cheaply manufactured
customer_reviews.text: These shoes arrived promptly for my husband. They had a sleek, sophisticated look. They also fit him well. However, they are cheaply made and scuff easily. He was only able to wear them for one event. He will have to purchase another quality pair of brown shoes for the next event requiring brown shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Shoe for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent materials, very good fit. At this price point I expected them to be uncomfortable and they are. Like strapping boards to your feet. But for an extra few $ I bought some inserts and they feel alright.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Great price. The shoes fit perfectly. I got a size 12 and my feet fit comfortably and not too tight. I have had them for almost a week and have been breaking them in. Each day they get more comfortable. I recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Stigi

customer_reviews.title: A great value and look good
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is well made and looks very nice. A good value and I am pleased. Not sure how long they will last but for the price point you can't go wrong. Love them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jose E. Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Bruno shoes, I just ordered a third. I've received several complements, they fit and look great. Time will tell how well they hold up. Can't beat the price, and they have large sizes.... I wear a 14
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable !
customer_reviews.text: My son is a size 15US and has trouble finding shoes. These shoes are a great price, decent fit and comfortable. They are not pinching his toes. There was no rubbing in the wrong places. He wore them for hours without a problem. The shoes are flexible and easy to walk in. I would buy them again if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Cavnoe

customer_reviews.title: Decent Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'd have to say the shoes fit ok. The toe of the shoes are a little more round than i perceived in the pics. I like square tiped shoes more, but they fit ok.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T Flippin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a coin flip for me as I have only bought shoes in person from select retailers. Not knowing what to expect, I was VERY pleased with the overall quality and the quality in which they arrived to me in the package. No damage in transit whatsoever. They come packaged in the Bruno Marc box wrapped individually in cloth sleeves. Very professional and they work amazing with a professional blue suit in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Wildgoose

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is great, however
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is great, however, it runs very large. Will be returning and recording a size to a size and half smaller.
customer_reviews.author: fotofan

customer_reviews.title: Quality without having to break the bank
customer_reviews.text: Bought it last minute and actually was surprised with the quality and style of the shoe. It looks and feels like an expensive shoe. My husband liked it and wore it to a wedding.
customer_reviews.author: CBorges

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair at my normal size which was WAY too big and I had to return. I then bought a pair at a full size smaller than normal, and they are still too big. I've only worn occasionally, and every time I get horrible pain in my arch and leg. I suppose for the price, it's exactly what you should expect.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat the value. This is excellent buy. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Datta

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: Shoes r good for maximum 2 month comfortable butt short life
customer_reviews.author: Sadaf Aamir

customer_reviews.title: Hard to squeeze feet in.
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to wear. It is small when you try to squeeze my feet and takes more time than usual to wear. Shoes looks good on the quality but not at the design prospective.
customer_reviews.author: Puru

customer_reviews.title: Smashed and ruined
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible! Arrived completely destroyed and shoes smashed! Threw it straight into the trash. I would never buy again. Not even worth my time to return
customer_reviews.author: kschl

customer_reviews.title: Good Throw-a-Way Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Want a pair of shoes for a month or so? This is it. I Probably wear them one or two times a week by the 3rd or 4th month the treading will unwind and pleather comes apart. But they looked good while they lasted. Buy good Leather shoes. The cheap price will get you, however, you will have to replace them in a short amount of time. Not really a saving.
customer_reviews.author: MUD

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my fiancee. He has flat feet and they were comfortable, where other shoes aren't that good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Like the cost, look of the shoe, type of shoe. I did buy a Dr. Shoel's insole to provide more support. Besides that like the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gartrell

customer_reviews.title: Quality Shoes Reasonably Priced
customer_reviews.text: Shoes run a little big so I ordered a half a size smaller. Good quality shoes for a decent price. Feet got a tired after extended use but that was wearing them for 14 hours while on a movie set.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A Jones

customer_reviews.title: ... huge I am stuck with them because I can't fine anyone to sell or give them too
customer_reviews.text: I think I was given the wrong size shoe my gosh these shoes are huge I am stuck with them because I can't fine anyone to sell or give them too. Where I am at the time it would have cost to much to send them back.. But I would tell you this they are a beautiful pair of shoes good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Roses

customer_reviews.title: Attractive shoe! runs big
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe. I got this for my 15 year old son who wares 12 in nike shoe. I had to return and get him a size 11. Looked real good on him
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Received 2 left shoes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the shoes in January for my son but he didn’t put them on until today and when he went to put the shoes on the box contained two (2) size 10 1/2 left shoes
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe fo rthe price
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by the quality of these shoes for this price. Well made and comfortable. I wear them at least four days a week and they sturdy with a classic style. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for the price. I wore them to 4 different weddings this year and have received many compliments from them. I was skeptical at first but glad I bought them now. I did scratch the toe up on a curb this weekend and am pretty sad about it. Hopefully I can get a marker or something to make it blend in. I would like them to be a little wider as I fit better in wider widths, but I wear them all night without an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made. The seams inside the shoe we’re very noticeable when wearing the shoe making it extremely uncomfortable. Definitely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I rate this product 5 out of 5, These shoes were as described in the advertisement and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A M A Z O N

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheap shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice cheap shoes. Bought for my son to wear to graduation. Not the most comfortable ever, but they run true to size and how often is an 18 year old kid going to wear dressy shoes anyway? Worked great for our situation!
customer_reviews.author: MMS

customer_reviews.title: Durable for work
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears dress shoes everyday to work and he found these to be great and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Fancy Look and Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great look, great feel. I have purchased this exact style look and colored shoes at perry Ellis for $55.00. These look great, stylish professional. I typically wear a 9 and this was just a bit more tight than a regular 9 but I would say 9 1/2 May be too big. Good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Wired.420

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: A really nice shoe that is offered at a great price. Have only worn twice, so can't say much about durablity.
customer_reviews.author: Old Grunt

customer_reviews.title: Purchasing liquidity
customer_reviews.text: I love the product looking forward to buy more products from amazon and from the company called Bruno marc hats off thank you satisfying the demands and expectations of the customers . please do make more orders and i would suggest if you decrease little bit of the liquidity it will be really good and ,many customers will look forward to purchase more products .
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for the price. Wore them most days to work and lasted me 3 years before the soles became pretty bare. Will buy another pair and will be happy if they last me another 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: nguyencj

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: They look great. I got a lot of compliments from people. For the prize they are not bad. A bit tight but would def recommend and buy from this seller. Shipping was fast as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Pratts

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product for the price. I was thoroughly impressed. Impressive packaging. Looks much more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Glenn Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Lost color. Dye wipes off.
customer_reviews.text: If anything spills on it (including plain water) it discolors. Then when you attempt to clean the dye comes off in the rag.
customer_reviews.author: Hollister Computer

customer_reviews.title: Fit good
customer_reviews.text: Husband wears a 12 and wear them 8 hours at work with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.....
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend these shoes! Upon arrival I liked the looks of the shoe, but the low quality started to show after just one day of light wear. The clear/shiny coating on the shoes started to crack and flake off. The shoes started looking so bad that I changed into my workout sneakers to finish my work day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoes. Hopefully they last. Worn for the first time today
customer_reviews.author: hjberry

customer_reviews.title: They looked so nice and fit him perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for his class reunion. They looked so nice and fit him perfect. They were comfortable too. He wears a size 11 and it fit perfectly and were comfortable. He will only wear these for special occasions so they should last.
customer_reviews.author: Lillyrose

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe and pretty comfortable considering they are dress shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my sons high school graduation. The shoes fit him well and looked good. The box they came in was torn and beat up but the shoes where in some sort of sleeve and protected. My son loved the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: OCS1

customer_reviews.title: Great style
customer_reviews.text: Arch was too tight and my middle of my toe fingers hurt in the middle lining of the shoe
customer_reviews.author: enrique badillo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great feels great
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!!! They look great and my son said they were instantly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: It' Okay - BUT THEY FELL APART
customer_reviews.text: These shoes WERE great. They were comfortable and looked great with my clothes. I primarily wore them with slacks. UNFORTUNATELY, the heel and back of one of shoes began to detach. It was very embarrassing and disappointing. I wish I could recommend the shoe but based on the durability, I can't. Improve it and I will purchase again for sure. I threw them away before taking a photo to share.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ended up sending them back.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look but did not like the fit. It felt tight around the top of the foot and the back above the heel was irritating. In the end I returned them for a different pair so my review is limited to just a day or two of experience.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger88

customer_reviews.title: Look good, but tight fit
customer_reviews.text: These look great considering how affordable they are. The sizing was too small though, and my feet felt tired by the end of the day. If you require a wide shoe, then I'd look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoe for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Hardly needed any breaking in. Fit well, comfortable, and true to size. Can't tell the difference between these and a $100 pair of dress shoes I own.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Might not be good for prolonged use.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a positive review. It came on time and looked great. It did hurt a bit, which had nothing to do with it not being my size. It was a half inch larger, but that is only because I found out my current shoes are a half inch smaller than what they say.
customer_reviews.author: David K?

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look very nice, seems like good quality and they fit perfectly. Just trying them on without socks they are very comfortable on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A. Griswold

customer_reviews.title: They technically shoes!
customer_reviews.text: They pass as real shoes. They are very stiff at first but once they break in a bit they're perfectly fine and hold up pretty well, considering.
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected, good value
customer_reviews.text: Looked great on the groomsmen of the wedding my husband was in
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Ruocco

customer_reviews.title: Funeral purposes
customer_reviews.text: They worked, affordable, and looked nice with the suity friend wore.
customer_reviews.author: PatrishaPhilly43

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, but unfortunatley they fell apart after a few months of casual use. These would be a nice addition for a one time use like a wedding, but not for the average working man.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Do not hold up
customer_reviews.text: These shoes do NOT hold up. My husband is not hard on his shoes and they are literally falling apart after wearing them <3 months. Super disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Law

customer_reviews.title: Lovely pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: These can be worn casually or formally. Great, sophisticated looking shoes. Looks far more expensive and the quality VS price is incredible. My only complaint is that when water hits the surface of the shoe, it leaves a rather noticeable water mark that you will need to "clean" off. Otherwise, I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bussom

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for a dress shoe
customer_reviews.text: What a perfect shoe, and very comfortable as well, I'm looking to potentially get one in black. You can't beat it, for the looks you'd think you paid $150 or more.
customer_reviews.author: C A

customer_reviews.title: Fine Fit
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 13EEE. In this case I ordered a 14, and it fits like a charm, with the obvious exception that the toe is bigger than needed. All in all, I am happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: William Robbins

customer_reviews.title: great shoes great price
customer_reviews.text: They fit a little large but i wear thicker dress socks during the work week so the ar doable but i would get i size down next time normally wear 10.5 tennis shoe 10 dress shoe i would go 9.5 next and try it
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shiny shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just in time for my sister's wedding last weekend. They were very comfortable. My only gripe was my feet did hurt after a while but nothing severe.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen. Joseph Horn

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: My 13yr old is in men sizes now & this size 8 fits perfect. Not too small or tight. He received many compliments.....boosted his confidence up also.
customer_reviews.author: J'Shamona

customer_reviews.title: Steppin with style
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pair of shoe for my 14 year old son he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nexiana Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great Price. Average Quality. Narrow Fit.
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat $30 dress shoes. They fit a little narrow. So I'd suggest ordering a half size to full size larger. Strings on these tend to come untied so anticipate double knotting them. Overall happy with my purchase. I expect these to not last but will purchase another set later in the year. FYI-I wear a size 13 tennis shoe, ordered a 12 in these.
customer_reviews.author: Caeleb I.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have three pair of this brand of shoe and this shoe is as good as my other two pair.
customer_reviews.author: Linnell Robinson

customer_reviews.title: He actually liked the style of these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband who's other dress shoes wore out in the soles. I didn't want to buy an expensive pair without him seeing it first as he can be kind of picky. He actually liked the style of these shoes. They are a great inexpensive purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline D

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I brought it a long time ago. Still, I have it and looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Ronak

customer_reviews.title: I like these shoes a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes a lot. They fit like bedroom slippers, look spiffy, and add a touch of elegance to my outfit. Thanks for providing quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Anderson

product_meta.title: Bruno Marc Men's Dress Shoes Formal Classic Lace-up Oxfords
feature_bullets: Breathable leather lining and soft latex cushioned insole for more comfort
Anti-slip stripes on the durable outsole for more traction and grip
Classic lace up oxford features stitching vamp and round toe design
Stylish, flexible and comfort dress shoes perfect for wedding,business,work,formal and casual
